casebody.data:
Rodrigo MORALES Rosario et al., Plaintiffs, Appellants, v. BLYTHE-MILLS COMPANY OF PUERTO RICO, Inc., Defendant, Appellee. No. 4684. United States Court of Appeals First Circuit. Feb. 20, 1953. Francisco Ponsa-Feliú, San Juan, Puerto Rico, for appellants. A. Castro Fernández, San Juan, Puerto Rico (McConnell & Valdés, San Juan, Puer-to Rico, on brief), for appellee.

Before MAGRUDER, Chief Judge, and MARIS and WOODBURY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed on the memorandum by Judge Ruiz-Nazario, 110 F.Supp. 259.
